shopping.notes: Cute boutique shop in Xiayao Li area, perfect for girlfriend who loves cute things. Browse for local creative products and souvenirs. Already included in afternoon itinerary. Open 10am-9pm.
shopping.location_local: 重庆市下浩里老街128号55号商铺

shopping.notes: Historic old street with local shops, cafes, and creative stores. Good for photography and browsing small boutiques. Part of afternoon itinerary. Open 9am-10pm. Cash and mobile payment accepted.
shopping.location_base: Nanbin Road and Dongshuimen Bridge, Chongqing
shopping.location_local: 重庆市南滨路与东水门长江大桥交叉口

shopping.notes: High-end open-air shopping complex with international brands including Apple, Adidas, Vivienne Westwood, and local boutiques. Perfect for evening stroll after arriving from Bazhong. Open 10am-10pm. Features fashion, lifestyle, and cute stores. Near Spring Xi Road metro station. Mobile payment widely accepted.

Traditional ancient street near Wuhou Temple, famous for local snacks and Sichuan souvenirs. Best for buying gifts: panda items, Sichuan spices, tea, local handicrafts. Bargaining expected. Open 9am-11pm but visit before noon due to afternoon flight at 14:35. Cash recommended though mobile payment widely accepted.
shopping.location_local: 成都市武侯祠大街231号附1号

shopping.notes: Three-story secondhand concept store in converted 1970s film building. Floor 2: ~13,000 curated books (3-4x off original price). Floor 3: ~1,500+ secondhand designer clothing (~2.5x off). Floor 1: art exhibitions with famous 405-tile cat-brick wall. The ONLY remaining physical Duozhuayu store in all of China. Open 10:00-22:00. Name from French 'Déjà Vu'.
shopping.location_base: No. 300 Anfu Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路300号

shopping.notes: Four-story Korean lifestyle brand flagship, their first store in China. Colorful 'dopamine aesthetic' products: stationery, phone cases, plush toys, pet accessories, kitchenware, pajamas, knit tote bags. Giant Wiggle Bear installations and Instagram-worthy 'sideways room'. Price range ¥46-554. Open 10:00-22:00. Rating 4.7/5.
shopping.location_base: No. 322 Anfu Road, Building 2, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路322号2幢

shopping.notes: Premium multi-brand designer boutique curating ~70% Chinese independent designers + ~30% international niche labels. Converted from former Hang Seng Bank branch. Famous 'Jellycat staircase' photo spot. Name '& FLOW' is a pun on 'Anfu' (安福). Brands include Calvin Luo, Sunnei, Nanushka. Price range ¥500-5,000+. Window shopping / browsing only (budget = 0). Open 10:00-21:00. Rating 4.7/5.
shopping.location_base: No. 168 Anfu Road, Yiyuan, Xuhui District, Shanghai
shopping.location_local: 上海市徐汇区安福路168号亦园

shopping.notes: Flagship store for blind box collectibles and designer toys. Wide selection of series including Molly, Dimoo, Labubu. Great for cute collectibles. Multiple locations on Nanjing Road.
shopping.location_base: Nanjing East Road Pedestrian Street, Huangpu District, Shanghai

shopping.notes: Alternative to Popmart. Designer toys and collectibles. More affordable than Popmart. Multiple series and collaborations. Check WeChat for exact locations.
shopping.location_base: Various locations in People's Square and Nanjing Road area

shopping.notes: Upscale mall near Nanjing Road. Fashion brands, niche boutiques. Less crowded than main Nanjing Road. Good mix of international and local brands. Open 10am-10pm.
shopping.location_base: No.789 South Nanjing Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai

shopping.notes: Newer upscale shopping complex. Fashion retailers and lifestyle stores. More modern than Nanjing Road. Less touristy. Metro accessible. Open until 10pm.
Niche lifestyle boutique. Fashion accessories, stationery, home goods. Instagram-worthy. Popular with young locals. Verify location via Dianping or WeChat.
University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.
University area shopping. Youth fashion, affordable clothing. Close to Tsinghua/Peking University. Ideal for evening after girlfriend's class. Open late.
Art galleries with boutique shops. Unique fashion items, accessories, designer goods. Creative atmosphere. Great for photography. Open 10am-6pm typically.
shopping.location_base: 798 Art Zone, Jiuxianqiao Road, Chaoyang District

shopping.notes: Flagship store in trendy Sanlitun area. Same blind box collectibles as Shanghai. Wide selection. Good for cute collectibles. Open 10am-10pm.
Beijing's trendiest shopping area. Fashion brands, lifestyle stores. Great for fashion shopping. Mix of luxury and mid-range. Open-air design. Open until 10pm.
Upscale lifestyle mall. Fashion, accessories, specialty stores. Less crowded than Sanlitun. Good atmosphere. Near Chaoyang Park. Open 10am-10pm.
shopping.location_base: No.6 Chaoyang Park Road, Chaoyang District

shopping.notes: Small boutiques and craft shops in historic hutongs. Unique fashion items, accessories. Affordable. Authentic local shopping. Avoid main tourist alley, explore side streets.
Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.
Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.
Evening shopping after girlfriend's class. Local shops, youth fashion. Affordable clothing and accessories. Good for comfort zone exploration.
High-end luxury shopping for final day. International designer brands. Premium shopping experience. Good for memorable purchases. Open 10am-10pm.
French department store with fashion and accessories. Good for final shopping. Quality items. Less crowded than SKP. Open 10am-10pm.
Purchase Chinese tea as gifts/souvenirs. Authentic local products. Good for memorable items. Ask for packaging suitable for air travel. Quality varies by shop.

notes: Shopping recommendations focus on girlfriend's interests: cute toy shops (Popmart, TOP TOY), fashion items, niche boutiques. Days 1-4 updated with Gaode Maps-verified locations and bilingual annotations. Day 1 features Xi Yue Box (熹玥盒子) in Xiayao Li - a cute boutique shop perfect for girlfriend's taste. Day 3 Taikoo Li is ideal for luxury browsing and photography. Day 4 Jinli provides souvenir shopping before Shanghai flight. Budget estimates are allocation for potential purchases (not fixed prices). Most stores accept Alipay/WeChat Pay, some accept international credit cards. For Popmart and toy stores, blind boxes typically cost 59-79 RMB each. Fashion items vary widely (200-2000 RMB range). University area shopping (Days 11, 12, 17-19) provides convenient evening options after girlfriend's classes. Main shopping days are Day 7 (Shanghai), Day 14 (Beijing), and Day 20 (final day). Verify store locations and hours via Dianping (大众点评) or Gaode Maps before visiting. Many boutique stores may have irregular hours. RedNote MCP server unavailable due to Playwright headless browser issue - recommendations based on Gaode Maps POI search and well-known shopping locations.
